mapper.select:
SELECT wgm.chat_id, wgm.join_time, wgm.type, wgm.join_scene, IFNULL(wu.head_image_url,wc.avatar) as member_avatar, IFNULL(wu.user_name,wc.name) as member_name FROM we_group_member wgm left join we_user wu on wu.user_id = wgm.user_id and wgm.type = ${@com.easyink.common.constant.GroupConstants@ID_TYPE_USER} and wu.corp_id = wgm.corp_id left join we_customer wc on wc.external_userid = wgm.user_id and wgm.type = ${@com.easyink.common.constant.GroupConstants@ID_TYPE_CUSTOMER} and wc.corp_id = wgm.corp_id
and wgm.chat_id = #{chatId}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO we_group_member ( id,user_id, chat_id, corp_id, union_id, join_time, join_scene, type, `name`,invitor ) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.userId}, #{item.chatId}, #{item.corpId}, #{item.unionId}, #{item.joinTime}, #{item.joinScene}, #{item.joinType}, #{item.memberName},#{item.invitor} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `name` = VALUES(`name`),union_id = VALUES(union_id)
